name: Carbify
shortDescription: Carbify ensures undeniable proof of carbon offsets while addressing up to 10 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).
description: Carbify is a sustainable blockchain-powered ecosystem that promotes sustainability through its unique certified Carbon Debits, supports local communities and transparently offsets carbon emissions through its NFTrees initiative, contributing to a better and greener future. It also integrates the gaming world with Eco Empires, which offers players the opportunity to build and manage a civilization to become carbon-neutral.
